Constructor Summary

Method Summary
protected  CallSite beforeInvocation(java.lang.Object delegate, java.lang.reflect.Method method, java.lang.Object[] params)
          Called immediately before invocation, this method must generate a CallSite for the invocation, whose return value (i.e., the result of calling CallSite.dispatch()) will be passed to MethodInvokerTemplate.afterInvocation(Object, org.nebularis.defproxy.introspection.CallSite) for post-processing prior to returning it to the caller.

Method Detail

beforeInvocation

protected CallSite beforeInvocation(java.lang.Object delegate,
                                    java.lang.reflect.Method method,
                                    java.lang.Object[] params)
Description copied from class: MethodInvokerTemplate
Called immediately before invocation, this method must generate a CallSite for the invocation, whose return value (i.e., the result of calling CallSite.dispatch()) will be passed to MethodInvokerTemplate.afterInvocation(Object, org.nebularis.defproxy.introspection.CallSite) for post-processing prior to returning it to the caller.

Overrides:
beforeInvocation in class MethodInvokerTemplate
Returns:
